additionalFields.areaDescription:
The AWS Cloud in Asia Pacific has 20 Availability Zones within six geographic Regions and one Local Region, with 34 Edge Network locations and five Regional Edge Cache locations.

Regions (Availability Zones):
Hong Kong SAR (3), Mumbai (3), Seoul (3), Singapore (3), Sydney (3), Tokyo (4), Osaka (1)
additionalFields.edgeLocations: Bangalore, India (3); Chennai, India (2); Hong Kong SAR, China (3); Hyderabad, India (4); Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; Mumbai, India (2); Manila, Philippines; New Delhi, India (5); Osaka, Japan; Seoul, South Korea (4); Singapore (3); Taipei, Taiwan(3); Tokyo, Japan (12); Melbourne; Perth; Sydney (2); Beijing, China (1); Shanghai, China (1); Zhongwei, China (1); Shenzhen, China (1)
additionalFields.regionalEdgeCaches: Mumbai, India; Singapore; Seoul, South Korea; Tokyo, Japan; Sydney, Australia

additionalFields.areaDescription:
The AWS Cloud in Europe, Middle East and Africa has 18 Availability Zones within six geographic Regions, with 39 Edge Network locations and two Regional Edge Cache locations.

Regions (Availability Zones):
Frankfurt (3), Ireland (3), London (3), Paris (3), Stockholm (3), Bahrain (3)
additionalFields.edgeLocations: Amsterdam, The Netherlands (2); Berlin, Germany; Cape Town, South Africa; Dublin, Ireland; Frankfurt, Germany (8); Helsinki, Finland; Johannesburg, South Africa; London, England (7); Madrid, Spain (2); Manchester, England; Marseille, France; Milan, Italy; Munich, Germany; Palermo, Italy; Paris, France (3); Prague, Czech Republic; Stockholm, Sweden (3); Vienna, Austria; Warsaw, Poland; Zurich, Switzerland; Lisbon, Portugal

additionalFields.areaDescription: The AWS Cloud in South America has 3 Availability Zones within one geographic Region, with four Edge Network locations and one Regional Edge Cache location.
additionalFields.edgeLocations: Rio de Janeiro (2), Brazil; Sao Paulo, Brazil (2)

additionalFields.areaDescription: The AWS Cloud in North America has 21 Availability Zones within six geographic Regions, with 44 Edge Network locations and two Regional Edge Cache locations.
additionalFields.edgeLocations: Ashburn, VA (3); Atlanta GA (3); Boston, MA; Chicago, IL (2); Dallas/Fort Worth, TX (5); Denver, CO (2); Hayward, CA; Jacksonville, FL; Los Angeles, CA (4); Miami, FL (3); Minneapolis, MN; Montreal, QC; New York, NY (3); Newark, NJ (3); Palo Alto, CA; Phoenix, AZ; Philadelphia, PA; San Jose, CA (2); Seattle, WA (3); South Bend, IN; St. Louis, MO; Toronto, ON
